attributes.action: Panama Leaks and Our Beloved Corrupt Politicians - Enough is Enough!!!!!!
attributes.additional_details: Loophole must stop&subjected to an impartial investigation. Assets must be seized&returned to countries of origin. To attain that aim, the UK parliament can legislate, implement&enforce a new/existing laws. We suggest that such legislation should ensure the following:That all accounts of all such companies and details of their beneficial owners should be put on public record; Proven that banks confirm the beneficial ownership of companies they provide service to Directorships on public record!!
attributes.background: Panama Papers transpired hundreds of politicians used offshore companies to hide their illegally gotten money in the UK and British Virgin Islands. World's capitals for tax avoidance, evasion and money laundering, the territory has 600,000 companies registered there with a population of just 30000/-

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition asking Parliament to make a specific change to tax law in the UK.
